Quarter 2 is off to a record-breaking start! We're thrilled to announce our achievements: surpassing 1,000,000 safe work hours, achieving the TIFFA MARK silver-level certificate, and successfully launching our new consumer brand, NIVO! Additionally, our CEO Torbj\u00f6rn Larisch recently appeared in an exclusive interview with ThaiPBS, sharing truly insightful perspectives on bridging cultures.<\/p>","saveContent":"

wpPost.title: The World Movers – Newsletter Q2 2024

seo.title: The World Movers - Newsletter Q2 2024 - FLS
seo.opengraphTitle: The World Movers - Newsletter Q2 2024 - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: Quarter 2 is off to a record-breaking start! We’re thrilled to announce our achievements: surpassing 1,000,000 safe work hours, achieving the TIFFA MARK silver-level certificate, and successfully launching our new consumer brand, NIVO! Additionally, our CEO Torbjörn Larisch recently appeared in an exclusive interview with ThaiPBS, sharing truly insightful perspectives on bridging cultures. Ready to… Continue reading The World Movers – Newsletter Q2 2024

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Quarter 2 is off to a record-breaking start! We're thrilled to announce our achievements: surpassing 1,000,000 safe work hours, achieving the TIFFA MARK silver-level certificate, and successfully launching our new consumer brand, NIVO! Additionally, our CEO Torbjörn Larisch recently appeared in an exclusive interview with ThaiPBS, sharing truly insightful perspectives on bridging cultures.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Ready to dive deeper into these stories and more? Check out our newsletter at: https://newsletter.fls-group.com/fls-the-world-movers-q22024-ext
